#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Configuration files =

Role of each configuration file.

== conf.xml ==

Contains parameters for the main application.

Contents:
_<skipBackupTimeLimit value=10000>_(value in seconds)
_<numberOfLastBackups value=3>_
_<restoreGapTime value=500>_(value in seconds)
_<workflowFailureAction value=(RESTART_SIMULATION|TERMINATE|RESTART_RECOVERY)>_
_<mailNotification value=(TRUE|FALSE)>_
